results.title: [New opinion on the mechanism of Dazhu (BL 11) for gonalgia with flexion-extension dysfunction].
results.text_hl: ...The effect of Dazhu (@<m>CHEMICAL_BL_11</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C063194 @@@BL 11@@@) for gonalgia with @DISEASE_Extranodal_Extension @DISEASE_MESH:D000079822 @@@flexion-extension dysfunction@@@ is remarkable, and its mechanism of action is interpreted as the influential point of bone treating @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone diseases@@@.
